timeline.bodyText: There are a few of these for other types in https://github.com/prestosql/presto/blob/master/presto-spi/src/main/java/io/prestosql/spi/session/PropertyMetadata.java#L141 do you want to put these there instead?
timeline.author: alexjo2144

+package io.prestosql.plugin.base.session;
+
+import io.airlift.units.DataSize;
+import io.airlift.units.Duration;
+import io.prestosql.spi.session.PropertyMetadata;
+
+import static io.prestosql.spi.type.VarcharType.VARCHAR;
+
+public final class PropertyMetadatas
+{
+    private PropertyMetadatas() {}
+
+    public static PropertyMetadata<DataSize> dataSizeProperty(String name, String description, DataSize defaultValue, boolean hidden)

replies.bodyText:
They are directly reusable, in SPI.
I can't put these methods in that place, because the methods use units and SPI doesn't have (and shouldnt have) dep on units.
replies.author: findepi
